My Services

UI/UX Design

As a UI/UX designer, I take a mobile-first approach to designing intuitive and engaging interfaces that enhance user experience and drive conversions. I work closely with my clients to create a user-first solution after conducting thorough research. My package includes user testing to ensure optimal functionality and user satisfaction. The price for this package is $3,000 and is worth the investment for the long-term success of your business.

Starting at $3,500

Full Stack Web Development

As a full stack web developer, I can handle everything from the front-end to the back-end, with API connections using React. Depending on the scope of the project, I can even use frameworks that will make dynamic sites like Next.js or static site frameworks such as Astro. My focus is on creating fast, secure, and scalable custom websites that meet your specific business needs.

Starting at $2,000

3D Design

As a 3D designer, I specialize in creating stunning 3D models and visualizations for architectural, product, and other design needs. I use ZBrush to design, retopologize, and render, and I can also provide rigging, lighting, and animation services to bring your designs to life.

Starting at $1,500

Motion Design

As a motion designer, I specialize in designing and animating graphics and videos that help bring your brand and message to life. I use the 12 principles of animation to create engaging and visually appealing designs that stand out. Let me help you tell your story through captivating motion graphics.

Starting at $2,500
